StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetCandidateSpecialExam]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
(@PersonID int ,@ExamType varchar(5) ,@ExamDate date.me) AS
SELECT 1 AS ID, [MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID] ,[SPECIAL_EXAM_TYPE] ,[SPECIAL_EXAM_DATE] ,[SPECIAL_EXAM_SCORE] ,[SPECIAL_EXAM_SCORE2] ,[SPECIAL_EXAM_SCORE3] ,[SPECIAL_EXAM_VERSION] FROM [dbo].[CANDIDATE_SPECIAL_EXAM] WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = @PersonID AND SPECIAL_EXAM_TYPE = @ExamType AND SPECIAL_EXAM_DATE = @ExamDate
